item.title: Marco Rubio to address bipartisan group of senators on Capitol Hill over drug boat strikes
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio will be on Capitol Hill on Wednesday to brief lawmakers on the U.S. military strikes on alleged drug boats.
